targets.query: SELECT mean("running") + mean("scheduled") + mean("blocked") FROM "openqa_jobs_by_group" WHERE ("url" = 'https://openqa.suse.de') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "group" fill(0)

alert.message: One of the file systems is too full
alert.name: File systems alert

targets.query: SELECT mean("used_percent") FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" = 'openqa' AND "path" = '/assets') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("used_percent") FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" = 'openqa' AND "path" = '/') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("used_percent") FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" = 'openqa' AND "path" = '/results') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("used_percent") FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" = 'openqa' AND "path" = '/srv') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean(active)+mean(inactive) FROM "openqa_minion_workers" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)

SELECT mean(total) as total, mean(used) as used, mean(cached) as cached, mean(free) as free, mean(buffered) as buffered  FROM "mem" WHERE host = 'openqa' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_recv),1s)*8 as "in"  FROM "net" WHERE (host = 'openqa' AND interface = 'eth1' AND $timeFilter) GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_sent),1s)*8 as "out" FROM "net" WHERE (host = 'openqa' AND interface = 'eth1' AND $timeFilter)  GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_recv),1s)*8 as "in"  FROM "net" WHERE (host = 'openqa' AND interface = 'eth0' AND $timeFilter) GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_sent),1s)*8 as "out" FROM "net" WHERE (host = 'openqa' AND interface = 'eth0' AND $timeFilter)  GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(reads),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE ("host" = 'openqa' AND "name" = 'vda') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(writes),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE   ("host" = 'openqa' AND "name" = 'vda') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_bytes),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE ("host" = 'openqa' AND "name" = 'vda')  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(write_bytes),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE ("host" = 'openqa' and "name" = 'vda') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_time),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE  ("host" = 'openqa' AND "name" = 'vda')  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(write_time),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE  ("host" = 'openqa' AND "name" = 'vda') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(reads),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE ("host" = 'openqa' AND "name" = 'vdc') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(writes),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE   ("host" = 'openqa' AND "name" = 'vdc') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_bytes),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE ("host" = 'openqa' AND "name" = 'vdc')  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(write_bytes),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE ("host" = 'openqa' and "name" = 'vdc') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_time),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE  ("host" = 'openqa' AND "name" = 'vdc')  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(write_time),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE  ("host" = 'openqa' AND "name" = 'vdc') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(writes),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE   ("host" = 'openqa' AND "name" = 'vdd') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *

SELECT mean("response_time_us") FROM "my_log" WHERE ("host" = 'openqa') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("response_time_us") FROM "apache_log" WHERE ("host" = 'openqa' AND "request" !~ /\/api\/v1\/ws/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("response_time_us") FROM "apache_log" WHERE ("host" = 'openqa' AND "request" !~ /\/api\/v1\/ws/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT difference(mean("buffers_alloc")) FROM "postgresql" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
